Pan.Prompt: Click and drag to pan view.

Rotate.Prompt: Click and drag to move view around rotation point. Change rotation point by moving crosshair.

Look.Prompt: Click and drag to look around.

Walk.Prompt: Click and drag to walk around.

WindowArea.Prompt: Click and drag to define viewing area.

Model.description: Fit all graphics in the chosen model

View.Navigate: Click and drag to navigate view. Hold Shift to change elevation. Hold Ctrl to look around.

Select.description: Selects Element for inspection or manipulation
Select.Prompt: Click or drag to selection elements.

Prompt.IdentifyBox: Identify elements by box corner points
Prompt.IdentifyLineAdd: Identify elements to add by crossing line
Prompt.IdentifyBoxAdd: Identify elements to add by box corner points
Prompt.IdentifyLineRemove: Identify elements to remove by crossing line
Prompt.IdentifyBoxRemove: Identify elements to remove by box corner points

Error.NotSuportedElmType: Element type not valid for this tool
Error.ProjectExtents: Invalid location. All elements must fit within the volume defined by the project extents.

Error.NoArea: Difference results in zero area region
Error.NotClosed: Element is not closed, can't be used

Prompt.PointReset: Enter point or RESET to complete
